DOC.brief_summary: To estimate rate percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) outcomes patient drug-eluting stent implantation take statin .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Estimate Rates Outcomes Patients Undergoing Percutaneous Coronary Intervention ( PCI ) With Drug Eluting Stent ( DES ) Implantation Who Take Statins
DOC.criteria: Stable angina indication PCI Hospitalization Russian Cardiological Research Center ( РКНПК ) PCI procedure drugeluting stent implantation Statin therapy initiate least one month prior PCI Written inform consent provide prior start participation study . Subjects unwilling unable provide inform consent . Presence ACS current hospitalization Severe CHF ( NYHA III/IV ) LVEF < 40 % Stroke within 6 month PCI Acute chronic inflammatory disease Antiinflammatory medication intake , exception aspirin Severe liver muscle disease Severe kidney disease / renal failure creatinine > 3 mg/dl History oncologic disease Conceivable impossibility come touch patient family 1year intervention
